mapper.insert: INSERT INTO book( bookName, language, area, sharedType, createTime, createId, remark )VALUES( #{bookName}, #{language}, #{area}, #{sharedType}, #{createTime}, #{createId}, #{remark} )
mapper.update: UPDATE book set bookName=#{bookName}, language=#{language}, sharedType=#{sharedType}, area=#{area}, remark=#{remark}, updateTime=#{updateTime}, updateId=#{updateId} WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.select: select * from book t where t.id=#{bookId}
select t.id , t.bookName, t.`language`, t.area , t.sharedType, t.createId from book t ,userbook a where a.bookId=t.id and a.userId=#{userId}
select t.id , t.bookName, t.`language`, t.area , t.sharedType, t.createId from book t where sharedType=1
SELECT t.id,t.pointName,t.chapterId,t.number,t.bookId FROM point t WHERE t.bookId=#{bookId}
SELECT COUNT(*) progress FROM pointExerciseDetail t WHERE t.userId=#{userId} AND t.bookId=#{bookId}
SELECT COUNT(*) progress FROM pointExerciseDetail t WHERE t.userId=#{userId} AND t.bookId=#{bookId} AND t.exerciseNumber>0
